HomePage.title: Hello!
HomePage.text: One project - two builds. Use npm run build:ru or npm run build:en to get different builds in different languages
HomePage.subtext: But remember! next-intl does not support arrays inside objects, instead use key-value pairs to iterate as shown below

0.title: first card
0.text: this is test card for example how you can iterate of objects 1

1.title: second card
1.text: this is test card for example how you can iterate of objects 2

2.title: third card
2.text: this is test card for example how you can iterate of objects 3

HomePage.stateOfLang: It is also possible to change certain words depending on which language was selected inside the client component.
